text: Al-Qadir University is under construction university in Pakistan. On the birthday of Abdul Qadir Gilani 29 Sha'ban Al-Qadir, the university foundation stone was laid by PM Imran Khan in Sohawa Jhelum District dated 5 May 2019. It is named after famous Sufi and founder of the Qadiriyya tariqa (Sufi order) of Sufism Abdul Qadir Jilani. ==References== Category:Educational institutions in Pakistan Category:Universities and colleges in Jhelum District Category:Educational institutions established in 2019 Category:2019 establishments in Pakistan Category:Public universities and colleges in Punjab, Pakistan
title: Al-Qadir University
